basics.name: Shanmuga Priya Kannan
basics.label: Senior ServiceNow Developer
basics.summary: ServiceNow Developer specializing in ITSM, integrations, and workflow automation. Skilled in Java, Python, cloud platforms, and data analytics with hands-on project experience in machine learning and market analysis.

work.summary: Worked on ITSM, CMDB, and Event Management for clients like Autodesk and Fortive. Developed REST APIs and 30+ custom workflows and catalog items to automate incidents, requests, and changes. Integrated third-party tools such as SAP, QlikView, and Azure, improving interoperability and automation.

projects.name: Shopping System
projects.summary: Developed user authentication and product catalog features to enhance security and streamline shopping.

projects.name: Market Analysis of Google Play Store Apps
projects.summary: Analyzed app-store data to identify trends and insights for developers and marketers.

projects.name: Real Estate Price Trend Analysis
projects.summary: Performed regression and time-series analysis on Connecticut housing data to forecast prices.

projects.name: Lung Cancer Risk Prediction Using ML
projects.summary: Built and evaluated Naive Bayes, Random Forest, and KNN classifiers on a 220 K+ record dataset.

projects.name: NYC Taxi Fare Prediction Pipeline
projects.summary: Built a distributed ML pipeline for 12 M+ trip records using Spark MLlib and automated reporting with Matplotlib + S3.
